company_name.description: The name of the company providing the product or service

customer_name.description: The name of the customer or client

product_name.description: The name of the product being discussed or ordered

pack_size.description: A list of packaging sizes or unit formats of the product (e.g., 25kg, 1L bottle)

lead_time.description: The expected lead time or delivery time frame for the product

shipping_option.description: The selected or available shipping option (e.g., air freight, ground, express)

price.description: A list of prices for the product, including currency if applicable (e.g., $250, 100 EUR)

quantity.description: A list of quantities for each product-pack size combination
